name: Plant Eater - Hoodie
description:
The very first Compassion Co hoodie!

This ultra soft, super comfy pullover hoodie features our logo on the front and the popular "Plant Eater" gorilla on the back to let the world know you don't need to eat meat to grow big and strong.

100% non-gmo domestically grown organic cotton, USA made and sweat shop free. Hand screened with water based discharge ink for a super soft hand feel.

Original hand drawn artwork.

unisex sizes only.

name: Plant Eater - Longsleeve
description:
FREE SHIPPING

Just in time for the winter snow!

This ultra soft, super comfy long sleeve shirt features our "Plant Eater" gorilla to let the world know you don't need to eat meat to grow big and strong.

100% non-gmo domestically grown organic cotton, USA made and sweat shop free. Hand screened with water based discharge ink for a super soft hand feel.

Original hand drawn artwork.

unisex sizes only.

Note: the arms fit a bit more snug on this one than on the t shirt, so if you prefer a baggier shirt we suggest ordering a size up.

name: Plant Eater
description: But where do you get your protein? We've all been asked roughly a million times yet no one stops to realize that all of the largest and strongest land animals are herbivores. Show off your plant eating pride in fashion with this new shirt featuring a mountain gorilla with attitude. printed on Royal Apparel organic cotton with soft-hand water based inks. Original hand drawn artwork. women's and unisex sizes available. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Grab Bag Surprise shirt
description: FREE SHIPPING You pick your size, we pick the shirt. We need to clear some space on our shelves to make room for the winter collection so here is your chance to pick up some Compassion Co shirts for ultra cheap. For $12 you get one shirt shipped to you. For $22 you get 2 shirts. No returns or exchanges on this one so please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Compassion Co - Black
description: FREE SHIPPING Our logo printed with a fun new four color fade on black. Original hand drawn artwork. 100% ultra soft domestically grown organic cotton sweat shop free, USA made printed with water based inks, hand blended together during the screening process so every shirt is slightly different. The unisex and women's shirt color order is reversed. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: It's OK, Go Vegan!
description: FREE SHIPPING A new version of one of our most requested shirts and buttons. Let everyone know that it's ok to care. Printed on a Royal Apparel organic cotton t shirt with water based inks. "It's OK To Give A Fuck" on the front, "Go Vegan" with our logo on the back. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Anything You Can Eat - Teal
description: FREE SHIPPING A teal variation of a classic design. The phrase you want to shout from the rooftops, "Anything you can eat, I can eat vegan." Let the world know that being vegan is not a sacrifice, it is a pleasure. A delicious, delicious pleasure. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on a Royal Apparel 100% organic cotton shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Anything You Can Eat...
description: FREE SHIPPING It's the phrase you want to shout from the roof tops, "Anything you can eat, I can eat vegan." Let the world know that being vegan is not a sacrifice, it is a joy. A delicious, delicious joy. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on a Royal Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Honey Belongs To Bees
description: FREE SHIPPING Show some love for those little guys that make life on earth possible. Plus who wants to eat bee vomit anyway? Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an American Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Vegan - Purple
description: FREE SHIPPING Our classic vegan design now on a vibrant ultra-violet shirt with grey scale print. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on a American Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Vegan - Black
description: FREE SHIPPING The design that started it all, our classic vegan design featuring many of the animals trapped in our food production system that we all fight so hard to protect. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an American Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: ADOPT
description: FREE SHIPPING Bring attention to the plight of the dogs trapped in the puppy mill system with this shirt featuring a super cute Boston Terrier on a charcoal shirt. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an American Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing. please note: we switched shirt suppliers with this shirt so some of the shirts are a darker grey. If this is a concern feel free to email compassioncompany@gmail.com to see pictures of the shade difference and state your preference.

name: Compassion Calf
description: FREE SHIPPING "Until he extends the circle of his compassion to all living things, man will not himself find peace." Our Compassion Calf shirt was inspired by this quote from Albert Schweitzer to portray the sense of peace one can finally feel when looking into the eyes of an animal after they go vegan. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an American Apparel 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based inks for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Cruelty Free - Blue
description: FREE SHIPPING Our cruelty free veggie shirt lets everyone know exactly what it is that vegans eat (well, some of it at least, next time we'll include some pizza and a cupcake). Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an A.S. Tee 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based ink for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Cruelty Free - Green
description: FREE SHIPPING Our cruelty free veggie shirt lets everyone know exactly what it is that vegans eat (well, some of it at least, next time we'll include some pizza and a cupcake). Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an A.S. Tee 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based ink for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Compassion Co - Green
description: FREE SHIPPING Straight forward and simple, our Compassion Co logo in cream color on a natural green shirt. Printed on an A.S. Tee 100% organic cotton t-shirt with water based ink for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Compassion Longsleeve - Black
description: FREE SHIPPING Cruelty Free Asparagus on the front, an assortment of delicious veggies on the back. Warm and comfy long sleeve for those chilly days. Printed on an A.S. Tee 100% organic cotton long sleeve shirt with water based ink for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.

name: Compassion Longsleeve - green
description: FREE SHIPPING Cruelty Free Asparagus on the front, an assortment of delicious veggies on the back. Warm and comfy long sleeve for those chilly days. Original hand drawn artwork. Printed on an A.S. Tee 100% organic cotton long sleeve shirt with water based ink for an ultra soft hand feel. Please consult our SIZE CHART before purchasing.
